    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_97538</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Squeezing a gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammendrücken eines Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Serrage d'un gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espremendo um gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprimere un gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπιέζοντας το α αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exprimir un gas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the ability of gas particles to be squeezed or compressed closer together. This results to increased mass and density.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">density</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Particle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">squeezing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Fähigkeit der 
Gaspartikel zusammengedrückt zu werden oder nahe zusammen komprimiert
worden. Dieses resultiert zu erhöhter Masse und zu Dichte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la capacité des 
particules de gaz d'être serré ou comprimé plus étroitement 
ensemble. Ceci résulte à la masse et à la densité accrues.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a abilidade de 
partículas do gás de ser espremido ou comprimido mais perto junto. 
Isto resulta à massa e à densidade aumentadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la capacità delle 
particelle del gas di essere compresso o compresso insieme più 
vicino. Ciò risulta a massa ed a densità aumentate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη δυνατότητα αέριο 
των μορίων για να συμπιεστεί ή συμπίεσε πιό κοντά από κοινού. 
Αυτό οδηγεί στην αυξανόμενες μάζα και την πυκνότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la capacidad de las 
partículas del gas de ser exprimido o comprimido más cerca junta. 
Esto resulta a la masa y a la densidad crecientes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Komprimierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammendrücken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
